TDD — Technical Design (Blueprints)

Component Blueprints

Blueprint: Component: CoreProcess TDD-1
links outgoing: SAD-2, FSD-1.1
links incoming: TDD-1.1, TDD-1.2, TDD-1.12, TDD-1.13, TDD-1.15, ISP-1, ISP-1.1, ISP-1.2, ISP-1.3, ISP-1.4
Blueprint: **Class Name:** `CoreProcess` TDD-1.1
links outgoing: TDD-1
Blueprint: **Dependencies:** `zmq`, `queue`, `itertools`, `transitions`, `yaml`, `threading`, `importlib`, `pathlib`. TDD-1.2
links outgoing: TDD-1

Socket Configuration:
Blueprint: Bind `ROUTER` socket to address defined in `ipc_config.yaml` (`core.router_bind`). TDD-1.3
links outgoing: ICD-1, SAD-3.2, SAD-3
Blueprint: Connect `PUSH` socket to `core.push_connect` (SNDHWM=1, LINGER=0) for logging. TDD-1.10
links outgoing: FSD-6.1, SAD-3.5, SAD-3
Blueprint: Set `ZMQ_ROUTER_MANDATORY=1` to detect unroutable messages. TDD-1.4
links outgoing: NFR-5.6, NFR-5

State Management:
Blueprint: Initialize `active_requests` dictionary: `Dict[str, Tuple[bytes, float, str]]` (ID → Identity, Timestamp, Command). TDD-1.5
links outgoing: SAD-1.4, SAD-1
Blueprint: Initialize HSM using `transitions.Machine`. State definitions include both statically-defined core states and dynamically-compiled states from Tool/Routine extensions. TDD-1.6
links outgoing: FSD-2.2, FSD-2.3, FSD-2

Concurrency (Main Loop):
Blueprint: **Receiver Thread:** Spawns a `threading.Thread` to poll the `ROUTER` socket and push frames to `self.queue`. TDD-1.7
links outgoing: SAD-4.1, SAD-4
Blueprint: **Event Loop:** Pops items from `self.queue` (PriorityQueue) and dispatches to HSM triggers. TDD-1.8
links outgoing: SAD-4.2, SAD-4
Blueprint: **Timeout Monitor:** On every loop iteration, check `active_requests` for timestamps exceeding `response_timeout_s`. TDD-1.9
links outgoing: FSD-7.3, FSD-7

Extension Discovery:
Blueprint: **Scan Logic:** On startup, iterate directories in `config.core.extensions.path`. TDD-1.11
links outgoing: FSD-3
Blueprint: **Validation:** Parse `manifest.yaml` in subdirectories (`tools/`, `routines/`). TDD-1.12
links outgoing: TDD-1
Blueprint: **Loading:** Use `importlib` to dynamically import the module specified in manifest `entry_point`. TDD-1.13
links outgoing: TDD-1

Command Resolution:
Blueprint: **Structure:** `self.command_registry: Dict[str, Callable]`. TDD-1.14
links outgoing: FSD-8.2, FSD-8
Blueprint: **Logic:** `resolve_intent(input_str: str)` checks registry before HSM dispatch. TDD-1.15
links outgoing: TDD-1
Blueprint: Component: ServiceClient TDD-2
links outgoing: SAD-3.1, SAD-4
links incoming: TDD-2.1, TDD-2.2, TDD-2.3, ISP-2, ISP-2.1, ISP-2.2, ISP-2.3
Blueprint: **Class Name:** `ServiceClient` TDD-2.1
links outgoing: TDD-2
Blueprint: **Purpose:** Standardized base implementation for UI, Runtime, and Audio services. TDD-2.2
links outgoing: TDD-2
Blueprint: **Dependencies:** `yaml`, `zmq`, `queue`, `itertools`, `threading`. TDD-2.3
links outgoing: TDD-2

Socket Configuration:
Blueprint: `DEALER`: Connects to Core `ROUTER`. Identity is auto-assigned by ZMQ. TDD-2.4
links outgoing: ICD-2.1, ICD-2
Blueprint: `PUSH`: Connects to LogServer `PULL`. Must set `SNDHWM=1` and `LINGER=0` (Fire-and-Forget). TDD-2.5
links outgoing: SAD-3.8, NFR-5.3, NFR-5

Queuing Strategy:
Blueprint: Internal `queue.PriorityQueue` populated by a dedicated `_receiver_thread`. TDD-2.6
links outgoing: SAD-4.1, SAD-4
Blueprint: Ordering enforced via `(priority, itertools.count(), message)` tuple. TDD-2.7
links outgoing: SAD-4.6

UI Requirements:
Blueprint: **State Awareness:** Must subscribe to HSM state changes and apply CSS classes (`sleeping`, `active`). TDD-2.8
links outgoing: FSD-9.1
Blueprint: **Input Control:** Widget `setReadOnly(True)` in Sleep; `installEventFilter` to catch Click-to-Wake events. TDD-2.9
links outgoing: FSD-9.2, SAD-4
Blueprint: Component: LogServerSink TDD-3
links outgoing: FSD-6.1, ICD-1
links incoming: TDD-3.1, TDD-3.2, ISP-3, ISP-3.1, ISP-3.2, ISP-3.3
Blueprint: **Class Name:** `LogServerSink` TDD-3.1
links outgoing: TDD-3
Blueprint: **Dependencies:** `loguru`, `zmq`. TDD-3.2
links outgoing: TDD-3

Socket Configuration:
Blueprint: Bind `PULL` socket to address defined in `ipc_config.yaml` (`logserver.pull_bind`). TDD-3.3
links outgoing: SAD-3.6, SAD-3

Processing Loop:
Blueprint: Execute tight poll loop (1ms timeout) to maximize throughput. TDD-3.4
links outgoing: NFR-4.6, NFR-4
Blueprint: Parse inbound frames as `[metadata_json, message_string]`. TDD-3.5
links outgoing: ICD-2.5, ICD-2

Persistence:
Blueprint: Configure `loguru` rotation (50MB) and retention (30 days). TDD-3.6
links outgoing: ICD-1

Interface Contracts
Blueprint: Component: Tool/Routine Interface TDD-4
links outgoing: FSD-3
links incoming: TDD-4.1, TDD-4.2, TDD-4.4, TDD-4.5, TDD-4.6, ISP-4, ISP-4.1, ISP-4.2
Blueprint: **Class Name:** `AbstractTool`, `AbstractRoutine` (ABC). TDD-4.1
links outgoing: TDD-4

Abstract Methods:
Blueprint: `initialize(core_context: CoreProcess)`: Inject Core dependencies. TDD-4.2
links outgoing: TDD-4
Blueprint: `get_hsm_states() -> List[Dict]`: Return state definitions for dynamic compilation. TDD-4.3
links outgoing: FSD-2.2, FSD-2
Blueprint: `handle_event(event_data: Dict) -> str`: Process business logic and return next trigger. TDD-4.4
links outgoing: TDD-4

Manifest Contract:
Blueprint: **Requirement:** Every extension directory must contain `manifest.yaml`. TDD-4.5
links outgoing: TDD-4
Blueprint: **Schema:** TDD-4.6
links outgoing: TDD-4

  • name: Unique identifier (string).

  • version: Semantic version (string).

  • type: “tool” | “routine”.

  • entry_point: Relative path to python module definition (e.g., “src.plugin”).
